nodes.text: Flesh camouflage, also known as a Outlaw tech Flesh camouflage set, was a product produced by Illicit Electronics.

Essentially a comprehensive disguise kit, a flesh camouflage set allowed a user to dramatically change their appearance and even foil bioscanners - either by obscuring their genetic sequence or mimicking one from a donated sample.

An advanced computer system, the disguise kit was complex, and had to be programmed with parameters of the security system to be infiltrated, and required a complete computerized record of a potential disguise's retinal, dermatoglyphic, and genetic patterns. With this information, a flesh camouflage set could produce:

The combined disguise was extremely convincing from a distance and up close, capable of withstanding intense scrutiny - including bioscans. However, while many elements within the kit were perfectly legal on their own, most planetary and galactic authorities took a dim view to anyone carrying a set of tools capable of masking one's identity down to the genetic level. For this reason, while not specifically illegal, discovery of the kit itself would arouse great suspicion.
